show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Said And Done
content:
The third and final round of political thrust and parry concluded last night at Lynn University in Boca Raton, Fla. <!--more--> And now, an all-out effort by Barack Obama and Mitt Romney to woo newly converted voters into their respective camps.
In this neck-and-neck race, every vote counts.
Will the “undecideds” now commit?
Will many of the “decideds” jump ship?
Will third-party voters stay their course?
Listener-analysts have their say.
